itemLabel: James Drummond Young, Lord Drummond Young

wikipedia_page.main: James Edward Drummond Young, Lord Drummond Young  (born 17 February 1950) is a retired judge of the Supreme Courts of Scotland and was formerly Chairman of the Scottish Law Commission.
